ves_brand.name: Megashop
ves_brand.description: Inspired by the catwalk and designed in Manchester, Amalie & Amber will effortlessly bring style points to your wardrobe. Explore flirty florals, lavish lace, co-ordinating pieces and style essentials that will take you from desk to dinner and onto the party.
ves_brand.meta_description: Inspired by the catwalk and designed in Manchester, Amalie & Amber

ves_brand.name: FloralStore
ves_brand.description: Founded in 1998, AX Paris brings catwalk looks to the high-street while remaining one stiletto ahead of the fashion game. Our selection of AX Paris is packed with striking body-con dresses, statement maxis, bright prints and vibrant colours that are perfect for day-to-night dressing and special occasions.
ves_brand.meta_description: Founded in 1998, AX Paris brings catwalk looks to the high-street while remaining one stiletto ahead of the fashion game.

ves_brand.name: Sexy Trends
ves_brand.description: Designed for newborns and babies up to 24 months, Babaluno clothing keeps baby stylish in comfort. Made from the softest fabrics for delicate skin, the collection includes pretty dresses, floral t-shirts and cool denim.
ves_brand.meta_description: Designed for newborns and babies up to 24 months, Babaluno clothing keeps baby stylish in comfort.

ves_brand.name: Clother
ves_brand.description: Created in USA 1963, Babeskin swimwear has been specifically designed for kids who love adrenaline sports. Whether it’s a practical tankini, vibrant dress or pretty swimsuit for little ones, Babeskin has everything you need for her love of water.
ves_brand.meta_description: Created in USA 1963, Babeskin swimwear has been specifically designed for kids who love adrenaline sports.

ves_brand.name: Boutique
ves_brand.description: Kit them out in this season’s coolest designs with the SS15 collection from Charlie&me. Inspired by fun in the park and playful days, the collection features graphic tees, bright shorts and sturdy shoes for boys and pretty dresses, summery floral prints and partywear for girls. Look out for bodysuits and booties for little ones too.
ves_brand.meta_description: Kit them out in this season’s coolest designs with the SS15 collection from Charlie.

ves_brand.name: One Shop
ves_brand.description: These lightweight shoes are perfect for relaxed weekend wear.
ves_brand.meta_description: These lightweight shoes are perfect for relaxed weekend wear.

ves_brand.name: Nextstore
ves_brand.description: Fresh out of the brand's London design house, our collection of Cutie clothing is packed with creative designs and unique detailing. Shop Cutie's pretty bodycon dresses, skater dresses and shift dresses in flattering cuts and a vibrant colour palette.
ves_brand.meta_description: Fresh out of the brand's London design house, our collection of Cutie clothing is packed with creative designs and unique detailing.

ves_brand.name: Big Shop
ves_brand.description: Emma-Jane has been the UK's favourite brand of maternity and nursing lingerie for over 25 years. Specialising exclusively in maternity wear, Emma-Jane offers the very latest designs and incorporates the latest technology to provide the most practical solutions for pregnancy and motherhood.
ves_brand.meta_description: Emma-Jane has been the UK's favourite brand of maternity and nursing lingerie for over 25 years.

ves_brand.name: Stationery
ves_brand.description: Harry Brown formalwear has got the London look, with elegant sartorial details and impeccable attention to detail. Each garment is carefully engineered with refined fit, form and function in mind. The cut is tailored for a truly modern silhouette
ves_brand.meta_description: Harry Brown formalwear has got the London look, with elegant sartorial details and impeccable attention to detail.

ves_brand.name: Maxx Shop
ves_brand.description: With over 100 years in the fashion and sporting arena, Gola’s strong links and impressive legacy can be seen in every collection. Streetwear trends are interpreted into high quality, wearable designs and key sporting pieces, reinforcing the brand’s signature: unique designs in a spectrum of colours and distinctive upper fabrics and materials.
ves_brand.meta_description: With over 100 years in the fashion and sporting arena, Gola’s strong links and impressive legacy can be seen in every collection.

ves_brand.name: Car Market
ves_brand.description: Ice Blossom never fails to deliver feminine pieces for every occasion. This season's party dresses from Ice Blossom include one shoulder dresses, elegant lace, sequins and bejewelled dresses with beautiful beading for glamorous evenings.
ves_brand.meta_description: Ice Blossom never fails to deliver feminine pieces for every occasion.

ves_brand.name: Mobile
ves_brand.description: Playtex believes that ‘Feeling better than ever’ starts with wearing the right bra. Supportive in the right places and with unique comfort features, Playtex bras in a range of feminine colours and styles combine style with support to make the most of your silhouette.
ves_brand.meta_description: Playtex believes that ‘Feeling better than ever’ starts with wearing the right bra.

ves_brand.name: Next Store
ves_brand.description: Brighten up your little one's wardrobe with the latest pieces from Tricky Tracks. With cosy jackets, bright all-in-ones, pretty dresses and patterned tops, Tricky Tracks clothing is great for your growing baby.
ves_brand.meta_description: Brighten up your little one's wardrobe with the latest pieces from Tricky Tracks.

ves_brand.name: Sharp
ves_brand.description: Brighten up your little one's wardrobe with the latest pieces from Tricky Tracks. With cosy jackets, bright all-in-ones, pretty dresses and patterned tops, Tricky Tracks clothing is great for your growing baby.
